text: In this lesson, students will be introduced to electrical signals in the human body, measure their reaction time, and construct a model of limb movement.

Students will measure the time it takes for them to react (grab a dropped ruler) and collaboratively construct an illustrated and annotated model that captures the sequence of steps associated with limb movement.
A 30 cm ruler for every two students.
Optional: A whiteboard or chart paper and markers for every group of 3-4 students.
